  • Constructor Details

    • MonsterWallThorn

      public MonsterWallThorn​(Tile spawnTile, Direction direction)
      create Wall Thorn Monster with given spawn tile and direction
      Parameters:
      spawnTile - Position that Wall Thorn Monster spawns.
      direction - Direction that this living being is going.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(double ticksPassed)
      Update every 1/60 second. Check if this monster is dead or not. If it is then do nothing. Otherwise set the direction it is going.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Updatable
      Overrides:
      update in class LivingBeing

    • collide

      public void collide​(Being otherCharacter)
      If this monster collide with other living beings, then kill them and move pass them. Otherwise, move to the opposite direction.
      Specified by:
      collide in interface Collidable

    • die

      public void die()
      This monster cannot die, so it does't do anything.
      Overrides:
      die in class LivingBeing

    • getCanPassThrough

      public boolean getCanPassThrough()
      Check if this entity can be pass through.
      Specified by:
      getCanPassThrough in interface Collidable
      Returns:
      Always return false.
